title: Doom The Blade of Oblivion
body:
Hp445+78 7.6/5sec 
Rage out of 100 + 5 Basic attack + 15 spell cast. Decay 10/sec after 10sec out of combat.
AD 57+4.8
Atk speed 0.713+1.11%
Armor 22+1.8
MR 17+1.4
Speed 340
 Passive: Madness
Every point of rage gives him 0.5dmg, atk speed and 0.25% life steal
Q Force slaughter 41/39/37/35/32 sec Must all be casted within 12.5 sec of the first cast.
1st cast: Fires a bolt of energy that deals 20/30/40/50/60 +40% AD damage to first enemy hit in a line. (550 range)
2nd cast: Fires a crescent shaped energy disc that deals 25/30/35/40/45 +40% damage to all enemies hit in a line . (550 range)
3rd cast: Dashes to an enemy within 550 range that deals 30/50/70/90/110 + 40% AD stunning 0.15sec
4th cast: Lunges backwards 550range dealing 50/65/80/95/110 +40% ad to units passed through.
There will not be continuous cast if the previous does not land.
W: Frenzied cut. 24.5/24/23.5/23/22.5 sec  Within 3x attack range.
Lashes out to nearby enemies dealing 40/80/120/160/200 + 8xAD over 4sec.

E: Blazing Rage 15sec
Passive: increase health regen by 2/4/6/8/10 /5sec 
Active: Sacrifising all rage, gains 20/30/40/50/60 movement speed and dealing 10/15/20/25/30 +15%AD as TD for 5sec (cannot gain rage in this duration)

R: Unleash Oblivion 100/85/70sec
Unleashes the power of his Doom Blade, Blade is enlarged gaining 125 atk range dealing damage to enemies between his target and him.
As well as doubling passive effect plus 25/50/75 AD.

replies.body: Ult is almost like Aatrox Ult, also, fix W's damage? Not sure if typo but you wrote "8xAD", did you mean 8%? Because 8 multiplied by the amount of AD you have... uhh... yeah :)

no its not a typo, considering that lots of champions can reach attack speed of 2/sec its not too far fetched as it is 8xAD over 4 sec. As well as the fact it does not crit. And its kind of like a Ray the Ult. It hits the targets between the target hit and himself.
Q: Cooldown refreshed to 5 seconds with each cast and then cooldown is back to 8 after last cast, so the player can think in between?
yes there are skillshots to fire, to acitvate the next ability, the previous must land.
By the way cooldown of W: 22/21/20/19/18? Otherwise too long

no the cooldown starts when the ability starts
so its more like 20.5/20/19.5/19/.5
Also, define specifically "Doubling passive effect" gains more rage? Has more AD, TD, etc.?
its what you think it is, the passive gives bonus AD atkspeed and lifesteal
